name: Customer Booking Interface
description: A user-friendly web interface allowing customers to view available tables and make online reservations. Includes calendar views, time slot selection, and party size specification.

name: Staff Table Management Dashboard
description: A comprehensive dashboard for staff to manage table assignments, view current occupancy, and handle walk-in customers. Includes real-time updates and table status visualization.

name: Reservation Administration System
description: Backend system for managing reservation policies, modifying bookings, handling cancellations, and maintaining waiting lists. Includes tools for setting up time slots and table configurations.

name: Table Availability Engine
description: Core system component that handles table inventory, tracks availability in real-time, and manages concurrent booking requests. Includes conflict resolution and optimization algorithms.

name: Customer Communication Module
description: System for sending reservation confirmations, reminders, and updates to customers. Includes email and SMS notifications for booking status changes and wait list updates.

name: Digital Menu Management System
description: Create a comprehensive digital menu management system that allows staff to update menu items, prices, and availability in real-time. Include support for seasonal menus, specials, and dietary information.

name: In-Restaurant Order Workflow
description: Develop a streamlined point-of-sale system for processing in-restaurant orders, including table management, order modifications, and integration with kitchen display systems.

name: Online Ordering Platform
description: Build a user-friendly online ordering system that allows customers to browse the menu, customize items, and place orders for pickup or delivery. Include features for saved preferences and order history.

name: Order Tracking and Status Updates
description: Implement a real-time order tracking system that provides status updates to both customers and staff throughout the order lifecycle, from receipt to preparation to completion.

name: Kitchen Order Management
description: Create a robust kitchen management system that organizes incoming orders, prioritizes preparation, and manages timing for multiple simultaneous orders across different preparation stations.

name: Shift Schedule Builder
description: Create and manage staff schedules with an interactive calendar interface, including drag-and-drop functionality and conflict detection. Enables managers to plan and publish weekly/monthly schedules while considering staff availability and skills.

name: Staff Profile Management
description: Comprehensive system for maintaining employee profiles including qualifications, certifications, skill sets, and availability preferences. Provides tools for updating and tracking staff information and role assignments.

name: Coverage Analytics Dashboard
description: Real-time analytics dashboard showing staff coverage levels, highlighting understaffed periods and potential scheduling gaps. Includes predictive analytics for optimal staffing levels based on historical data and business requirements.

name: Time-Off Management
description: Streamlined system for managing employee time-off requests, sick leave, and availability updates. Includes approval workflows and automatic schedule adjustment capabilities.

name: Role Assignment and Rotation
description: Tools for defining roles, assigning staff to appropriate positions, and managing role rotations. Includes skill-matching functionality and workload distribution features.

name: Digital Menu Platform
description: Create an interactive digital menu system that allows customers to browse restaurant offerings with rich media, filtering options, and real-time availability updates.

name: Online Reservation System
description: Develop a comprehensive booking interface that enables customers to make, modify, and cancel restaurant reservations with automated confirmation and reminder features.

name: Order Tracking Dashboard
description: Implement a real-time order tracking system that allows customers to monitor their order status, estimated preparation time, and delivery progress through an intuitive interface.

name: Customer Account Management
description: Create a secure customer portal where users can manage their profiles, view order history, save favorites, and maintain payment information.

name: Digital Communication Hub
description: Establish a centralized system for managing customer notifications, feedback, and communications across various digital channels including email, SMS, and in-app messaging.

name: User Access Management
description: Comprehensive system for managing employee accounts, roles, and permissions across the restaurant system. Includes user creation, role assignment, and access level configuration.

name: System Configuration Hub
description: Central interface for configuring restaurant-wide system settings including operating hours, service areas, payment methods, and integration settings. Enables administrators to customize system behavior to match restaurant operations.

name: Restaurant Profile Management
description: Tools for managing core restaurant information including location details, business information, tax settings, and brand assets. Serves as the source of truth for restaurant identity and business parameters.

name: Operational Policies Configuration
description: Interface for setting up and managing restaurant policies including reservation rules, cancellation policies, special event handling, and service protocols. Allows administrators to define and update operational guidelines.

name: Administrative Reporting & Audit
description: Tools for monitoring system usage, tracking administrative changes, and reviewing security logs. Provides oversight of system activities and configuration changes for accountability.
